title: Morty and the Teacher's Apples
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,289 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 790L, Fiction Series
description: Morty and the Teacher's Apples continues the mischievous adventures of Morty, a third grade mouse who finds himself in a dilemma when he plays a trick on his teacher that he then later regrets. Text is supported by engaging illustrations and is ideal for highlighting positive character traits.
